abstract: Saturday Profile of Kimberley Chongyon Motley, American lawyer who has established herself as foreign litigator and expert in Shariah law in male-dominated Afghanistan; Motley is subject of documentary Motley's Law, which was broadcast on Al Jazeera America, and is involved in several important human rights cases.
lead_paragraph: Money prompted Kimberley Chongyon Motley to take a brief assignment in Kabul. Eight years later, she’s still there, handling urgent human rights cases.

headline.main: Outspoken, American and a Woman: Afghanistan’s Only Foreign Litigator Stands Out
headline.print_headline: Outspoken, American and a Woman: A Lawyer Stands Out in Afghanistan
